alert.note: Alert for Muskingum (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 7:53PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Muskingum. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Depending on ice behavior, any release of the ice jam could result in sudden rises of water, leading to a rapid flooding situation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 749 PM EST, emergency management reported an ice jam just north of the Muskingum Lock and Dam in Zanesville. Flooding is already occurring at upstream locations with the river out of its banks, specifically along Riverside Airport Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Zanesville, North Zanesville and Drake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
